long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üéâ The best Instagram tool is designed for those who want to export comments from Instagram to excel xlsx or csv for giveaways. after installing, you can download comments in bulk with one click and export to excel xlsx or csv files.

üÜï New Update
‚úì Add support for exporting xlsx files in excel.
‚úì Upgrade extension manifest V3, more secure and stable.
‚úì Fix some issues.

‚öôÔ∏è Get started
1. Enter a Instagram post URL
2. Click the export button

Another way, there will be an export button on all instagram posts module, click this button to start exporting.

üí° Features
‚úì Export data to XLSX files.
‚úì Export data to CSV files.
‚úì One Click Export.
‚úì Exported data including User Id, User Name, Avatar Url, Profile Url, Comment Id, Comment Text, Publish Date.

üîí Data Privacy
All data is processed in your local computer, it never passes through our web server and no one knows what you have saved.

üëã Contact
If you have any issues, feel free to contact echobot.dev@gmail.com
